line_1: 'Tis but Nature's better dress:
line_2: Joyful we the fraud confess,

line_1: Solitude here fix my seat,
line_2: Here in Cowley's soft retreat.

line_1: Here in Cowley's soft retreat.
line_2: Solitude here fix my seat,

line_1: Lay me in the silent mead,
line_2: Where the elm expands the shade,

line_1: Where the murmuring river flows,
line_2: And each rising beauty blows:

line_1: Where the elm expands the shade,
line_2: Lay me in the silent mead,

line_1: And each rising beauty blows:
line_2: Where the murmuring river flows,

line_1: There I'll say, in peace of mind,
line_2: "Empty greatness fall behind."

line_1: "Empty greatness fall behind."
line_2: There I'll say, in peace of mind,

line_1: Teach thy votary all the powers
line_2: Tell how short-liv'd are the flowers,

line_1: Of each plant, and every tree,
line_2: Bring the moral home to me,

line_1: Tell how short-liv'd are the flowers,
line_2: Teach thy votary all the powers

line_1: Bring the moral home to me,
line_2: Of each plant, and every tree,

line_1: Bid me fleeting life despise,
line_2: Make me humble, make me wise.

line_1: Make me humble, make me wise.
line_2: Bid me fleeting life despise,

line_1: Pride within my lowly cell
line_2: Solitude, with thee I'll dwell!

line_1: Never yet up-rear'd her head,
line_2: Pride with me is long since dead:

line_1: Solitude, with thee I'll dwell!
line_2: Pride within my lowly cell

line_1: Pride with me is long since dead:
line_2: Never yet up-rear'd her head,

line_1: Cold to Pleasure, deaf to Praise,
line_2: Here I wish to end my days.
